channel.title: Thoughts on today is tomorrow's past
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on today is tomorrow's past

item.title: Don't say it. Do it!
item.author: ingo@ingo-richter.io (Ingo Richter)
item.description: Don’t talk too much about the things you want to do. Don’t overthink everything. Don’t make it more complicated than it has to be. Don’t stop learning. Don’t stop trying. Try harder. Try smarter. Don’t say “it’s impossible”. Move faster. Do it!
